title: european deco font
content:
Could someone please help me identify this font? this page is from a book on european art deco typefaces and design from the post WWI-pre WWII era. thank you very much.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005658im_/http:/typophile.com/files/deco_3612.jpg)
author: gee_double_you

comments.content:
Are you sure the font isn't featured in the book itself?

- Lex
unfortunately no, it's mostly a collection of old posters and adverts. buit it doesn't really go into what fonts are named.

Also similar is [Coquette](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005658/http:/ms-studio.com/FontSales/coquette.html) by Mark Simonson.

- Lex

Also, as Nick points out on [this page](http://web.archive.org/web/20150220005658/http:/www.myfonts.com/products/nicksfonts/peregrinations-cd/), I think this is a typical speedball style from that time. Perhaps one of his might work?
